Empty function that must be implemented by all specialised classes.

Substitutes each hyperedge of the graph with full mesh of all connected vertices

Calculates all properties of a graph.

Disables router or device

Enables disabled router or device

Starts a thread for executing a command.

Creates one line for each packet in dump.

Calls a generator function and returns topology
sub _getAverage
Calculates average convergence properties of each run
sub _getAverageFromOldResultFile
Calculates average convergence properties of each run for result files in old format
sub _getClusteringCoefficient
Returns the clustering coefficient of the graph with 2e/v*(v-1)
sub _getDevices
Determines devices of scenario using ifconfig
sub _getDiameter
Returns diameter of Graph with dijsktra shortest path algorithm
sub _getFirstTimeStamp
Determines first timestamp of the run
sub _getLastTimeStamp
Calculates the timestamp of the packet that leads to the convergence of the whole scenario.
sub _getLeaves
Returns a list of leaves of the graph
sub _getPacketProperties
Removes packets from other services then RIPv2 and extracts informations from RIPv2 packets
sub _initObjects
Creates Topology, Scenario and Result objects and sets Scenario and Result as member variables
sub _initPacket
Is called from constructor
sub _initResult
Reads result file (if it contains lines) and sets member variables

Sets necessary member variables and converts dump files into a list of RIP-Packet objects ordered by timestamp

Sets member variables

Sets member variables.

Creates new dump directory and moves the dump files to it.

Removes best and worst value if there are more then two values

Removes lines before the firts and after the last timestamp
